resources.string: Tap the bottom right button to add a new To-Do. You can also write long sentences with line breaks.
Tap the checkbox to complete the process.
Slide to the left to see the Details button and the Delete button.
Long Press the handle icon on the right to reorder.
You can switch between the task lists by opening the menu in the upper left corner.
You can also delete a task from the Task List edit screen.
Check the schedule with the client first thing in the morning on Monday. If next week is not available, we will discuss it.
Review the reports that were submitted last week. Make a list of the points raised and reply to them by email.
Check the details of the problem and assign a person to work on it.
